title: How to Play Keys on Guitar (and Vice Versa) in Rock Band 3

steps.headline: Go to "My Goals" in the career menu.
steps.description: Look at the Guitar Immortal goal, which is unlocked by passing 50 songs on Medium guitar (or higher) while getting 5 stars. This will probably not take a day, unless you devote a whole day to playing Rock Band 3.

steps.headline: Once you unlock the goal, a screen will come up saying that you can play keys on guitar!
steps.description: Once this happens, it also works vice versa; you can play Guitar and Bass on keys.

steps.headline: Pick a song while on the guitar, pick keys, and play to your heart's content!

text: Go to "My Goals" in the career menu. Look at the Guitar Immortal goal, which is unlocked by passing 50 songs on Medium guitar (or higher) while getting 5 stars. This will probably not take a day, unless you devote a whole day to playing Rock Band 3. Once you unlock the goal, a screen will come up saying that you can play keys on guitar! Once this happens, it also works vice versa; you can play Guitar and Bass on keys. Pick a song while on the guitar, pick keys, and play to your heart's content!
